name: Cakespy: Double Chocolate Ice Cream Pudding Pie
description: Topping the list of things I'll never do again? Preparing instant pudding pie filling with cold milk. Why? Because as it turns out, it's far more delicious when you make it with melted ice cream.
recipeIngredient: 1 large package (5.9 oz) instant chocolate pudding

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, beat pudding mix and melted ice cream with a whisk until fully combined (about 2 minutes).
Spoon mixture into your prepared pie crust (it will be rather thick). Using an offset spatula, smooth the filling so that it is evenly distributed.
Refrigerate for 2-3 hours to let set before eating. If desired, top with a dollop of whipped cream before serving.
